document_data.name: ''Diseased''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Diseased''''' was an enchantment that caused a weapon to inflict a wasting [[disease]].
document_data.Powers: Anyone who received an injury from a ''diseased'' weapon was at risk of instantly contracting [[filth fever]], and manifesting symptoms without any incubation period. The disease itself was not [[magical]], so the afflicted creature could recover from it naturally.
document_data.Creation: Crafting a ''diseased'' weapon required not only the skills to [[Item enchantment|create magic weapons]], but also access to the ''[[contagion]]'' spell.
document_data.History: During the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''diseased'' weapons were sometimes wielded by the [[Talontar]] [[blightlord]]s of the [[Unapproachable East]], They were also utilized by some of the more sinister [[Red Wizard]]s of [[Thay]], who gave such weapons to their minions.
